name: The Sims
description: REQUIRES a NoCD executable. Please download it before continuing.
notes: - Ignore the message about lacking memory, just press Yes and continue. - Don't press "Play" after the setup of the game has finished. Just wait for the installer to finish. - This installer has only been tested with Complete Collection and Deluxe Edition, but other versions should work too. - NoCD executable for Deluxe Edition (you need unrar to get it extracted): http://www.gameburnworld.com/gp/gamefixes/simsdeluxeedition.shtml - NoCD executable for Complete Collection (you need unrar get it extracted): http://www.gameburnworld.com/gp/gamefixes/simscompletecollection.shtml

files.installer: N/A:Select the Setup executable (Setup.exe in Setup folder, NOT start.exe):

content:
files:
- nocd: 'N/A:Select the NoCD executable (Sims.exe):'
- installer: 'N/A:Select the Setup executable (Setup.exe in Setup folder, NOT start.exe):'
game:
  arch: win32
  args: -r1024x768 -skip_intro -skip_verify
  exe: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Maxis/The Sims/Sims.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
  working_dir: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Maxis/The Sims/
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating prefix
    install_mono: false
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- move:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/Sims.exe
    src: nocd
- execute:
    command: chmod 770 "$GAMEDIR/Sims.exe"
    description: Changing permissions...
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    app: quartz
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Installing The Sims...
    exclude_processes: Start.exe start.exe
    executable: installer
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/drive_c/Program Files/Maxis/The Sims/
    src: $GAMEDIR/Sims.exe
wine:
  overrides:
    winegstreamer: disabled
  version: lutris-4.12.1-x86_64
